markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Camouflage](/Feats.aspx?ID=519) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 174 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73) (Level 12), [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness. In natural terrain, you can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) even without [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) or being [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4).

<title level="2">Camouflage leads to...</title>
[Shadow Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=545), [Stealthy Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=532)
name: Camouflage
